title: If you want to know more about me...

markdown.headingText: If you want to know more about me...
markdown.markdown:
::: column-screen ![](images/sealine.JPG) ::: I grew up in Neijiang, a small city in Sichuan, China. ::: {layout="[40,60]"} ![](images/marvin.jpg) ::: {#likes} I like: - science fiction - My favorite authors include [Stanisław Lem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanis%C5%82aw_Lem), [Douglas Adams](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Douglas_Adams) and [Ted Chiang](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Chiang). - cooking - It helps me enter "flow state" (otherwise my life would be in danger). Besides, I cook well with recipes. - stand-up comedy and comedies in general - my top-5 comedy show: - [Louie](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louie_(American_TV_series)) (by Louis C.K.) - [Nathan for You](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nathan_for_You) (by Nathan Fielder) - [Community](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Community_(TV_series)) (by Dan Harmon) - [Black Books](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Books) (by Dylan Moran) - [Fleabag Season 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fleabag) (by Phoebe Waller-Bridge) ::: ::: ::: {#map layout="[55,5,40]" layout-valign="bottom"} ::: {#dislikes} I don't like: - small talks - Why would people ask questions they don't want to know answers to? - mountain hiking - Stay away from the activities reminding you that life is meaningless. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ I now live on campus, and I love the weather and the sea in Hong Kong. Even after being here for a while, I am still amazed by the beautiful scenes that I encounter every now and then. Sometimes, I go to the seaside at night to appreciate the wind, the starry sky, and the sound of the waves. I enjoy sharing the campus with wild boars and dogs because they remind me that compared to them I'm an apeman. ::: center {{< video https://www.youtube.com/embed/aRHqs8SffDo width="200" >}} ::: :::
